notes.text: We now provide an option to display a custom message in the message strip above the list report table
You can now use the Share to Microsoft Teams option
The filterBar API now correctly handles filters with an undefined value
We've added a method to the FilterBar building block and the ListReport.ExtensionAPI that gets all active filters
We now support the usage of constant values in the HeaderInfo title
We now pass the values of semantic date fields during external navigation
You can now mergeÂ user setting values from SAP Fiori launchpad with default values from annotations or the manifest
: In the object page and subobject page we now provide keyboard shortcuts to trigger forward path actions, that is, primary actions, such as 'Edit'
We now provide scrollable header facets on mobile devices
: In the list report we now provide keyboard shortcuts to trigger forward path actions, that is, primary actions, such as 'Go'
We now provide an option to skip the 'Create' pop-up dialog for new actions in specific cases
We now ensure a list report with multiple views and no filter bar is displayed correctly
When navigating to an ObjectPage that has LongRunners requests, we now ensure that no data from previous contexts is displayed
You can now execute the PrepareAction or global side effects by pressing Enter in draft mode
A grid table on an object page now has the correct number of rows
We now ensure to always show the correct information for a quick view, even if a dynamic semantic object is used
You can now render semantically connected fields as a link to allow for navigation using these fields
We now use HeaderInfo annotations in the MessageBox of the 'Mass Edit' dialog
We now ensure that the message dialog remains open if there are back-end errors for unbound and static actions
We now ensure all mandatory properties (with navigation) are marked with an asterisk in the filterBar
Action buttons for a table are now disabled or enabled correctly when switching to edit mode in an app using the flexible column layout
When navigating from an object page to a subobject page, the focus is now correctly set on the erroneous field when a user clicks on the ActiveTitle in the message popover
We now provide a message strip in the header of an object page to notify about available messages
The link in the MessagePopover is now disabled when the backend error is on a table row not loaded
We now provide the possibility to configure a handler function to control the visibility of actions
The semantic keys now is showing correct text arrangement
The object page now loads correctly if the section is not selected
The context for navigation entity sets is now set correctly when doing outbound navigation
HeaderInfo TypeName now supports i18n text in the create mode
The QuickView now correctly displays the QuickViewFacets when there is only one direct application
We no longer display a clickable link in the message dialog if the error occurs in a hidden column of a table in an object page for which no navigation is configured
We no longer apply the viewState if the appState data isn't available
Navigation via a breadcrumb link now also works when the dimension names contain special characters like a forward slash ('/')
The Table and FilterBar building blocks now work correctly in custom sections of an object page
